original_text: And I will shew mercies unto you, that he may have mercy upon you, and cause you to return to your own land.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 불쌍히 여기리니 그도 너희를 불쌍히 여겨 너희를 너희 본향으로 돌려보내리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: And I will shew mercies unto you
that he may have mercy upon you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희에게 긍휼을 베풀게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and cause you to return to your own land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 자기 땅으로 돌아가게 하려 함이니라
